SELECT ID AS id , BUYER_ID AS buyerId , CLASSES_CODE AS classesCode , MACHINING_CODE AS machiningCode , BREED_CODE AS breedCode , STANDARD_ID AS standardId , TNC_STD_ITEM_ID AS tncStdItemId , TNC_STD_ITEM_NAME AS tncStdItemName , STD_VAL1 AS stdVal1 , STD_VAL2 AS stdVal2 , STD_VAL3 AS stdVal3 , DESCRIPTION AS description , REMARK AS remark , IS_RESEARCH AS isResearch FROM by_research_std_tnc WHERE BUYER_ID = #{filterMap.buyerId} AND STANDARD_ID = #{filterMap.standardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO by_research_std_tnc ( ID, BUYER_ID, CLASSES_CODE, MACHINING_CODE, BREED_CODE, STANDARD_ID, TNC_STD_ITEM_ID, TNC_STD_ITEM_NAME, STD_VAL1, STD_VAL2, STD_VAL3, DESCRIPTION, REMARK, IS_RESEARCH, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER ) SELECT @rownum:=@rownum + 1 + a.maxId as id , #{buyerId} AS buyerId , #{classesCode} AS classesCode , #{machiningCode} AS machiningCode , #{breedCode} AS breedCode , #{standardId} AS standardId , a.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID AS tncStdItemId , a.TNC_STD_ITEM_NAME AS tncStdItemName , a.TNC_STD_VAL1 AS stdVal1 , a.TNC_STD_VAL2 AS stdVal2 , a.TNC_STD_VAL3 AS stdVal3 , '' AS description , a.REMARK AS remark , '0' AS isResearch , #{delFlg} , #{updId} , #{updTime} , #{updId} , #{updTime} , #{updId} , #{updTime} , #{ver} FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=0 AS rowNum , (SELECT ifnull(MAX(ID), 0) FROM by_research_std_tnc) AS maxId , std.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID , item.TNC_STD_ITEM_NAME , std.TNC_STD_VAL1 , std.TNC_STD_VAL2 , std.TNC_STD_VAL3 , std.REMARK FROM pd_tnc_std std INNER JOIN pd_tnc_std_item item ON item.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID = std.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID AND item.IS_CATALOG = '1' AND item.DEL_FLG = std.DEL_FLG WHERE std.STANDARD_ID = #{standardId} AND std.DEL_FLG = '0' ORDER BY std.TNC_STD_ITEM_ID) a
